summary: The diff largely implements the requested cake shop homepage with responsive product grid, product-details dialog, header navigation, contact section, and a warm bakery-themed palette. However, some product display names do not exactly match the user-provided names, and the diff adds unrequested backend/auth scaffolding and a branded footer attribution.

missing_requirements.requirement: Homepage renders a product grid/list with exactly 6 products matching the names provided by the user.
missing_requirements.reason: The product names shown in the UI data are capitalized differently than the user-provided names (e.g., 'Nuts Cookies' vs 'Nuts cookies', 'Honey Cake' vs 'honey cake', 'Kitkat Chocolate Cake' vs 'Kitkat chocolate cake'), so they may not match exactly as requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister stub added (empty Motoko actor).
hallucinated_features.reason: No backend work was requested for this build; requirements are frontend-only.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity / actor + React Query scaffolding included.
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication is explicitly not required for this site; these hooks/provider setup are not requested by any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes caffeine.ai attribution and heart icon branding.
hallucinated_features.reason: A footer and external attribution link were not requested in the BuildRequest.
